price: (Allāhu) sọ pé: “Rárá (wọn kò lè pa ọ́). Nítorí náà, kí ẹ̀yin méjèèjì mú àwọn àmì (iṣẹ́ ìyanu) Wa lọ (bá wọn). Dájúdájú Àwa ń bẹ pẹ̀lú yín; À ń gbọ́ (ọ̀rọ̀ yín).
arabic: قَالَ كَلَّاۖ فَٱذۡهَبَا بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآۖ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّسۡتَمِعُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla kallā fa-idh'habā biāyātinā innā maʿakum mus'tamiʿūna
